name: test_e2e_with_logs[324_CMD_BASH_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_BASH_001` |
| **Name** | Direct bash command execution |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | bash_injection |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `; /bin/bash -c 'whoami'`
- **Encoded**: `%3B%20%2Fbin%2Fbash%20-c%20'whoami'`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~83000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:10:59.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_BASH_001-1772266259149-p8y6xp pattern_id=CMD_BASH_001 uri=/?q=%3B%20%2Fbin%2Fbash%20-c%20'whoami' client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Advanced command injection attempt test_id=CMD_BASH_001-1772266259149-p8y6xp pattern_id=CMD_BASH_001 uri=/?q=%3B%20%2Fbin%2Fbash%20-c%20'whoami' client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
